CustomField.description: This is used in the conga composer to determine which template is used.
CustomField.formula:
IF(
ISPICKVAL(Shared_Solar_System__r.Product__r.Program__c,"SMART - Community Solar"),"{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_AOBC}",
CASE(Utility__c, "Consolidated Edison", "{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_ALS_CONED}", "Eversource (East)","a2F0a000001RC7W,{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_EVERSOURCE_MA_SREC_EXCEL}", "Eversource (West)","a2F0a000001RC7W,{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_EVERSOURCE_MA_SREC_EXCEL}", "National Grid (MA)","a2F0a000001RBod,{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_NG_MA_SREC_EXCEL}", "NYS Electric and Gas","a2F0a000000OY5fEAG", "Orange and Rockland","{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_TEMPLATE_OANDRALS}", "National Grid (NY)", IF(Shared_Solar_System__r.UCB__c,"{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_NGRID_NY_UCB_ALS}","{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_NGNY_ALS_EXCEL},{!Environment.VAR_CONGA_NGNY_ALS_PDF}"), "Central Hudson Gas and Electric", "a2F0a000000Ob66EAC", "" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used in the conga composer to determine which template is used.
CustomField.label: Conga Template ID
